title: Georges Rouault (1871-1958)
creator_credit: Genevieve Nouaille Rouault, Pierre Courthion, Isabelle Rouault and Texture Films
brief_description: A film on the twentieth century master painter Georges Rouault, his childhood, the atelier of Gustave Moreau, the scandalous Fauves, violent social protest, the Miserere and the last glowing Biblical Landscapes.
creator_credit_for_label: Genevieve Nouaille Rouault, Pierre Courthion, Isabelle Rouault and Texture Films
